divs: Sighting DetailsThere it was again! I went outside for my afternoon break and looked up at the sky and was shocked to see the same disc as I saw yesterday in the same location. Traveling from northeast to the southwest. There is one difference; this time after watching for about one minute, it turned around and headed back to the northeast. I watched it for about five minutes until it went past the treeline.
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There was one other sighting in Dallas on or around August 8th 2008
Summary: Daylight sighting of shiny disc above Denton
